title: Ticket #7514: Bugfixes and creature comforts for DataReuse
description:
Now that #7389 is merged, even though DataReuse is a hidden feature, I'd like to start testing it on some glideins.

This ticket is the catch-all for minor testing improvements and bugfixes. At the time of writing, this includes:

  1. Any state management bug codefixes.
  2. Improving logging and debugability of the state calculations.
  3. Including statistics into the slot ad for Ganglia integration. Miron has been asking for metrics on this!
remarks:

This is intended to be an internal feature for this release. Resolving for now.
